INSERT INTO IBIMS115B ( CNSB_DCD , CNSB_SQ , RSLTN_YR , SN , DEAL_NO , MTR_DCD , JDGM_DCD , ATDC_TRGT_DCD , ATDC_TRGT_EMPNO , ATDC_ANGT_EMPNO , ATDC_YN , APRV_OPPS_DCD , OPNN_RGST_DT , OPNN_RGST_EMPNO , OPNN_CTNS , DEL_YN , HND_DETL_DTM , HND_EMPNO , HND_TMNL_NO , HND_TR_ID , GUID ) VALUES
( #{item.cnsbDcd} , #{item.sn} , #{item.rsltnYr} , #{index}+1 , #{item.dealNo} , #{item.mtrDcd} , #{item.jdgmDcd} , #{item.atdcTrgtDcd} , #{item.atdcTrgtEmpno} , #{item.atdcAngtEmpno} , #{item.atdcYn} , #{item.aprvOppsDcd} , #{item.opnnRgstDt} , #{item.opnnRgstEmpno} , #{item.opnnCtns} , DEFAULT , DEFAULT , #{item.hndEmpno} , #{item.hndTmnlNo} , #{item.hndTrId} , #{item.guid} )
mapper.select:
SELECT ATDC_TRGT_DCD , IFNULL(ATDC_TRGT_EMPNO, '') AS ATDC_TRGT_EMPNO , IFNULL(( SELECT EMP_NM FROM IBIMS003B WHERE EMPNO = ATDC_TRGT_EMPNO ), '') AS ATDC_TRGT_EMPNM , IFNULL(ATDC_ANGT_EMPNO, '') AS ATDC_ANGT_EMPNO , IFNULL(( SELECT EMP_NM FROM IBIMS003B WHERE EMPNO = ATDC_ANGT_EMPNO ), '') AS ATDC_ANGT_EMPNM
FROM IBIMS115B WHERE CNSB_DCD = #{cnsbDcd} AND RSLTN_YR = #{rsltnYr} AND CNSB_SQ = #{sn} GROUP BY ATDC_TRGT_DCD, ATDC_TRGT_EMPNO, ATDC_ANGT_EMPNO
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM IBIMS115B WHERE 1=1 AND CNSB_DCD = #{cnsbDcd} AND CNSB_SQ = #{sn} AND RSLTN_YR = #{rsltnYr}
mapper.select:
SELECT A.CNSB_DCD , ( SELECT CD_VL_NM FROM IBIMS002B WHERE CMNS_CD_GRP = 'R016' AND CD_VL_ID = A.CNSB_DCD ) AS CNSB_DCD_NM , A.RSLTN_YR , A.CNSB_SQ , A.SN , A.DEAL_NO , A.MTR_DCD , A.JDGM_DCD , B.MTR_NM , D.CNSB_OPN_DT , B.PTFD_CRNCY_CD , CONCAT('(',B.PTFD_CRNCY_CD,') ', ( SELECT CD_VL_NM FROM IBIMS002B WHERE CMNS_CD_GRP = 'I027' AND CD_VL_ID = B.PTFD_CRNCY_CD )) AS PTFD_CRNCY_CD_NM , B.PTFD_AMT , IFNULL(C.APVL_AMT, '') AS APVL_AMT , B.MTR_PRG_STTS_DCD , ( SELECT CD_VL_NM FROM IBIMS002B WHERE CMNS_CD_GRP = 'I011' AND CD_VL_ID = B.MTR_PRG_STTS_DCD ) AS MTR_PRG_STTS_DCD_NM , A.APRV_OPPS_DCD , IFNULL(( SELECT CD_VL_NM FROM IBIMS002B WHERE CMNS_CD_GRP = 'A012' AND CD_VL_ID = A.APRV_OPPS_DCD ), '') AS APRV_OPPS_DCD_NM , IFNULL(A.OPNN_CTNS, '') AS OPNN_CTNS FROM IBIMS115B A /* 위원회안건내역(협의체위원정보) */ , IBIMS103B B , IBIMS112B C /* 위원회안건내역(협의체안건정보) */ , IBIMS111B D /* 위원회회의내역(회차정보) */ WHERE 1 = 1 AND ( A.ATDC_TRGT_EMPNO = #{eno} OR A.ATDC_ANGT_EMPNO = #{eno} ) AND A.DEL_YN = '0' AND B.DEAL_NO = A.DEAL_NO AND B.MTR_DCD = A.MTR_DCD AND B.JDGM_DCD = A.JDGM_DCD AND B.LAST_YN = '1' /* 최종정보 */
AND B.MTR_PRG_STTS_DCD < '501'
AND C.CNSB_DCD = A.CNSB_DCD AND C.RSLTN_YR = A.RSLTN_YR AND C.CNSB_SQ = A.CNSB_SQ AND D.CNSB_DCD = A.CNSB_DCD AND D.RSLTN_YR = A.RSLTN_YR AND D.SN = A.CNSB_SQ AND D.JDGM_RSLT_DCD > '303' ORDER BY A.CNSB_DCD , A.RSLTN_YR , A.CNSB_SQ , A.SN

SELECT A.ATDC_TRGT_DCD AS ATDC_TRGT_DCD , A.ATDC_TRGT_EMPNO AS ATDC_TRGT_EMPNO , ( SELECT EMP_NM FROM IBIMS003B WHERE EMPNO = A.ATDC_TRGT_EMPNO ) AS ATDC_TRGT_EMPNM , IFNULL(A.ATDC_ANGT_EMPNO, '') AS ATDC_ANGT_EMPNO , IFNULL(( SELECT EMP_NM FROM IBIMS003B WHERE EMPNO = A.ATDC_ANGT_EMPNO ), '') AS ATDC_ANGT_EMPNM , A.ATDC_YN AS ATDC_YN , A.APRV_OPPS_DCD AS APRV_OPPS_DCD , ( SELECT CD_VL_NM FROM IBIMS002B WHERE CMNS_CD_GRP = 'A012' AND CD_VL_ID = A.APRV_OPPS_DCD ) AS APRV_OPPS_DCD_NM , A.OPNN_CTNS AS OPNN_CTNS , IFNULL(A.OPNN_RGST_DT, '') AS OPNN_RGST_DT , A.SN AS SN , A.CNSB_DCD , A.CNSB_SQ FROM IBIMS115B A INNER JOIN IBIMS112B B ON A.DEAL_NO = B.DEAL_NO AND A.MTR_DCD = B.MTR_DCD AND B.JDGM_DCD = B.JDGM_DCD AND A.CNSB_SQ = B.CNSB_SQ WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.CNSB_DCD = #{cnsbDcd} AND A.CNSB_SQ = #{cnsbSq} AND A.RSLTN_YR = #{rsltnYr}
AND A.DEAL_NO = #{dealNo} AND B.SN = #{sn} AND A.CNSB_DCD = B.CNSB_DCD AND A.MTR_DCD = B.MTR_DCD AND A.RSLTN_YR = B.RSLTN_YR
